long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
To use the TLDR extension, simply click and get a summary of any webpage. Using the TLDR website, you can also create a folder of multiple webpages and PDFs. Chat with the folder to get insights.

- Students make folders to review slides and prepare for exams
- Professionals add their resume and job description to a folder to draft cover letters
- You may use tldr to blaze through newsletters in your inbox
